relevant_findings.General: Well-appearing man, not in acute distress, lying back in bed
relevant_findings.HEENT: MMM, no JVD, no JVP elevation
relevant_findings.Cardiovascular: RRR, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.Lungs: CTAB, no rales, wheezes, or ronchi
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Soft, nondistended, tender to superficial and deep palpation in RUQ, +guarding, +rebound
relevant_findings.Extremities: No edema on b/l, 1+ DP pulses b/l
relevant_findings.Skin: Excoriations and lesions bandaged on LLE, Bandaged R hand
relevant_findings.Neurological: A&O grossly, CNII-XII grossly intact, moving all extremities appropriately

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant pain to palpation in epigastric and RUQ regions.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: RUQ pain has been worsening over the course of a month.
